mutants.code:
from math import ceil

def minimize_max_candies(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, candies) = case
        sarr = sum(candies)
        mavg = sarr * N
        while N > 1:
            sarr -= candies.pop()
            N -= 1
            mavg = max(mavg, sarr / N)
        results.append(int(ceil(mavg)))
    return results

def minimize_max_candies(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, candies) = case
        sarr = sum(candies)
        mavg = sarr // N
        while N > 1:
            sarr -= candies.pop()
            N -= 1
            mavg = max(mavg, sarr / N)
        results.append(int(ceil(mavg)))
    return results

def minimize_max_candies(test_cases):
